philosophy: One click from finished code to Theme Store submission. Zero manual work.
objective: Generate production-ready release package that passes Shopify's 47-point review checklist.

checks.name: Accessibility Check (File 23)
checks.pass_criteria: 100% keyboard nav, all ARIA labels present
checks.on_fail: HALT. Fix A11Y issues (Shopify will reject).

checks.name: Dependency Check (File 09)

checks.pass_criteria: All files referenced, no broken includes
checks.on_fail: WARN. List orphaned files for review.

file_submission_checklist.content:
# Shopify Theme Store Submission Checklist

## Technical (Auto-Checked)
- [x] Theme Check passed (0 errors)
- [x] Lighthouse scores >80 (Performance, A11Y, SEO)
- [x] Security scan passed (File 11)
- [x] A11Y check passed (File 23)

## Content (Manual Check Required)
- [ ] Demo store has 50+ products
- [ ] All images high-quality (no watermarks)
- [ ] Blog has 5+ posts
- [ ] All collections populated (8+)
- [ ] About, Contact, Shipping pages created

## Documentation (Auto-Generated)
- [x] README.md
- [x] CHANGELOG.md
- [x] LICENSE.txt

## Screenshots (Manual Upload)
- [ ] Desktop: 3-4 screenshots (1920x1080)
- [ ] Mobile: 2 screenshots (750x1334)
- [ ] Feature callouts added

## Listing Details (Manual Input)
- [ ] Theme name chosen
- [ ] Description written (200-300 words)
- [ ] Target niche specified
- [ ] Pricing set ($180-$350)
- [ ] Keywords added (max 10)

## Final Review
- [ ] Tested on real device (iPhone, Android)
- [ ] Checkout flow works
- [ ] No console errors
- [ ] Passed to QA team (File 05)

**Ready to Submit:** YES / NO

[Theme Name] is designed for modern furniture brands that value craftsmanship and clean aesthetics. Built with performance in mind, it achieves 95+ Lighthouse scores while delivering a visually stunning shopping experience.

**Key Features:**
- Asymmetric Bento Grid for visual interest
- Video-first product showcases
- Built-in size guide and care instructions
- Multi-currency support (Shopify Markets)
- 3 pre-configured presets (Minimal, Industrial, Warm)

**Perfect For:**
Furniture stores, home decor brands, artisan makers

**Technical Excellence:**
- WCAG 2.1 AA compliant
- Zero jQuery dependencies
- Optimized for mobile (LCP <1.5s)

Explore the demo store to see [Theme Name] in action.

pricing_strategy.justification: If pricing >$250, highlight advanced features (e.g., 'Includes AI-powered product recommendations')

final_gate.question: Would you personally buy this theme for $250?
final_gate.if_no: Do NOT submit. Iterate on design or features.

submission_process.step_4: Fill listing details (name, description, keywords, pricing)

reason_2.issue: Accessibility failures (missing ARIA labels, poor contrast)

reason_3.issue: Poor demo quality (empty collections, Lorem Ipsum)
reason_3.prevention: Use File 21 (Demo Master) to populate properly

reason_4.prevention: Run Lighthouse CI (File 07) and respect Performance Budget (File 15)

reason_5.issue: Broken functionality (cart doesn't work, filters broken)
reason_5.prevention: Run QA Protocol (File 05) on real devices

post_approval_maintenance.update_frequency: Every 3-6 months (or when Shopify updates OS 2.0)
post_approval_maintenance.support_commitment: Respond to support emails within 48 hours

integration_with_axis_workflow.when_to_run: After Phase 4 (Demo Complete), final step before submission
